description: A large mass of wiring, chips, and circuits encased in plastic, all running in parallel to operate a cyborg's motor skills and life support systems. Can attach to an artificial blob version of a human brain to add additional functionalities.

An artificial blob heart encapsulated in a protective plastic case, guarding against both decay and damage. Many wires and sensors protrude from the artificial blob flesh, with several cables and hoses extending from the exterior of the case.

A spherical steel object, comprised of high quality lenses, a camera, and circuitry designed to be able to send readable data to either a human brain, artificial blob version of a human brain or an electronic system.

A chunk of plastic barely resembling a lung. Only the outer piece is totally inorganic, with a silver-platinum alloy used as a antimicrobal and air filtration agent inside the artificial organic interior.
A completely artificial organ designed to keep a cyborg's blood clean and free from parasites and infections. Functionally similar to a human kidney.
An artificial blob human body that has been thoroughly dissected, and is now covered with incisions of various sizes, allowing the many modifications to the skeletal structure.

An artificial blob human body that has been dissected and augmented to a high degree. Little of the original skeleton is present, having been mostly replaced with hardened steel, and has sections of armor plating grafted to it's skin.
